::Slayer::

"On my way," Slayer replies, walking off toward Prebon's office.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> 
> In the distance Prebon watched the scanners, he carefully monitored 
the
> battle between the Alliance and the Maximals." Trainers, report to 
my office
> for orders." he decided to let the Alliance take care of the 
Maximals then
> go after whoevers left.
> 
> Bullet was the first to reply, "On my way lord Prebon."
> 
> Ignatius was refueling at the time so he couldn't go right 
away. "I'll be up
> soon as possible."
> 
> Blaze was monitoring communications so she was already outside his 
office.
> 
> Hammer was outside playing in the sand in Grizzly bear mode. "Yes 
Sir.:"
> 
> (This means Slayer too.)
